c74object.name: bl.keylatch
c74object.digest: Toggle with pressing and releasing a key.
c74object.description: Outputs 1 while a key is pressed down, and 0 when it is released. It is essentially a simple timesaver combination of key and keyup.

outlet.digest: 1 while the key is being pressed, 0 when it is released.

objarg.name: key
objarg.digest: The ASCII code of the key to watch.
